messages.title: A FAIR CHANCE FOR EVERY CHILD
messages.content: Invest in schools, Smaller class sizes, Abolish tuition fees

messages.title: Invest in schools
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will invest an extra £2.5 billion into our schools to give every child a fair chance. This will help improve school discipline and provide more one to one tuition to help struggling pupils.

messages.title: Smaller class sizes
messages.content: That £2.5 billion will also help cut class sizes for those vital early years. Smaller class sizes will enable teachers to spend more time with each pupil.

messages.title: Abolish tuition fees
messages.content: The removal of Labour's unfair tuition fees will help tackle massive student debts. It will mean that more young people from less well off families can attend university too.

messages.title: Experience and commitment
messages.content: Claire Kelley is truly passionate about education. She has practical experience in local schools & showing a track record of community support.

messages.title: LABOUR CAN'T WIN HERE
messages.content: It's Lib Dem or Conservative in our area. Labour can't win.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing an extra £2.5 billion into schools for smaller class sizes and abolishing tuition fees to reduce student debts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem or Conservative in our area. The Labour Party has come a humiliating fourth place in the last three Harrogate Council by-elections and were third here at the General Election. Even lifelong Labour supporters are switching to back Claire Kelley this time.

issues.education: Claire Kelley and the Lib Dems plan to invest £2.5 billion to improve education by reducing class sizes and abolishing tuition fees.

leaflet.personalStatement: Claire Kelley is truly passionate about education and has shown a track record of community support.

politicalExperience.role: Elected parent governor at her children's infants and secondary school in Harrogate

endorsements.endorsement: Local education champion Phil Willis MP is backing Claire to work hard for schools. 'We need an MP who really will campaign for our schools - Claire is clearly the best choice.'

quotes.text: Our local schools could have no better champion than Claire Kelley
quotes.source: Local MP and former headteacher Phil Willis

images.caption: Claire with son Alex and daughter Emily who both went to school in Harrogate.
